name: Number F0: Utopic Future Dragon
text:
3 Xyz Monsters with the same Rank, except "Number" monsters
(This card's original Rank is always treated as 1.)
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a "Number F0: Utopic Future" you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the activation, then if your opponent controls that monster, take control of it.
